kl{
    Version{"2.1.6.69"}
    durationUnits{
        hm{"h:mm"}
        hms{"h:mm:ss"}
        ms{"m:ss"}
    }
    unitsNarrow{
        area{
            acre{
                one{"{0} ac"}
                other{"{0} ac"}
            }
            square-foot{
                one{"{0} ft²"}
                other{"{0} ft²"}
            }
            square-mile{
                one{"{0} mi²"}
                other{"{0} mi²"}
            }
        }
        length{
            mile{
                one{"{0} mi"}
                other{"{0} mi"}
            }
            yard{
                one{"{0} yd"}
                other{"{0} yd"}
            }
        }
        pressure{
            inch-hg{
                one{"{0} inHg"}
                other{"{0} inHg"}
            }
        }
        speed{
            mile-per-hour{
                one{"{0} mi/h"}
                other{"{0} mi/h"}
            }
        }
        volume{
            cubic-mile{
                one{"{0} mi³"}
                other{"{0} mi³"}
            }
        }
    }
    unitsShort{
        area{
            acre{
                one{"{0} ac"}
                other{"{0} ac"}
            }
            square-foot{
                one{"{0} ft²"}
                other{"{0} ft²"}
            }
            square-mile{
                one{"{0} mi²"}
                other{"{0} mi²"}
            }
        }
        length{
            mile{
                one{"{0} mi"}
                other{"{0} mi"}
            }
            yard{
                one{"{0} yd"}
                other{"{0} yd"}
            }
        }
        pressure{
            inch-hg{
                one{"{0} inHg"}
                other{"{0} inHg"}
            }
        }
        speed{
            mile-per-hour{
                one{"{0} mi/h"}
                other{"{0} mi/h"}
            }
        }
        volume{
            cubic-mile{
                one{"{0} mi³"}
                other{"{0} mi³"}
            }
        }
    }
}
